name: Ovation Up Inc.
description: Developer of an actionable guest feedback platform designed to drive revenue for multi-unit restaurants. The company's platform tracks and figures out the enterprise's loyal customers and assists them in leaving positive online reviews, as well as provides customer feedback and increases social media following, enabling businesses to monitor and measure their web presence and engage increased customers by improving their online marketing strategies.
one_liner: Developer of an actionable guest feedback platform designed to drive revenue for multi-unit restaurants. The company's platform tracks and figures out the enterprise's loyal customers and assists them in leaving positive online reviews, as well as provides customer feedback and increases social media following, enabling businesses to monitor and measure their web presence and engage increased customers by improving their online marketing strategies.
